1.0.name: wordpress/sticky-notice
1.0.description: This adds a fixed semi-transparent highlighted text box in your site with your own text. This may be helpful if you need to add any argent notice (like - The site in under maintenance). You can edit the text with the WordPress content editor and place the box in any corner or at the center of the page. You can also choose color-theme from four options and set the font-size as your choice.
